signature: TransformedSplitMap<J, K, U, V> transformingMap(Map<K, V>, Transformer<? super J, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super U, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve transforming keys using a Transformer.
Both methods involve transforming values using a Transformer.
Both methods involve transforming maps, although transformingMap is a factory method and transformMap is an instance method.
The put method uses the transformed key and value, similar to what transformingMap sets up.
The putAll method also involves transforming keys and values, similar to the setup in transformingMap.
The checkSetValue method transforms a value, similar to the value transformation setup in transformingMap.
